content.description: Donovan was riding his bike with his family when he fell. The whole family stopped and attended to his injury while he cried for several minutes. Later in the week, Donovan fell off his bike while riding with his friends in the neighborhood. This time he jumped back on his bicycle and tried to catch up with his friends.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best explains the difference in Donovanâ€™s experiences?

choices.label: The experience of pain is solely a chemical process.
Genetic factors determine the experience of pain.
The kinesthetic sense determines the experience of pain.
The experience of pain involves cognitive factors as well as physical factors.

content.answer: The experience of pain involves cognitive factors as well as physical factors.
